website_summaries.verdict: The ideal utilitarian pick for larger families looking to purchase an extra-large, commercial-grade swing can.
pros: Large capacity build able to hold 23 gallons of waste
Can features two liner cinches, which forces bag to stay in place
A good choice for both indoor and outdoor use
cons: Trash bags for a can this large can get a little pricey
Only comes with one handle, making the product problematic to move

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.text: When I placed this order, it said that it included the container. So, now I am very disappointed and mad with this order. I'm not going to pay $75 dollars just for a Lid... This order is going back as soon as possible... Plus in the picture, they put the lid with the stickers and not even sent it. If they are not going to sell something like they show in the photo, So then, do not mislead people, don't give false information about a product If it is not as they describe it... I gave one star because I don't have another choice, but they do not Even deserve One star.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use too!
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is great. We bought it for home use. We moved to a city that doesn't provide large trash cans to throw regular kitchen bags into after filling so we're back to the huge heavy duty black bags (practically lawn/leaf bags). Anyway, this can is tall enough to hold the black bags perfectly but without taking up a lot of space. It is VERY tall so be aware of the measurements. The top of the can (sold separately but totally worth it) is great too because it closes itself after throwing trash in. This is would make a great garage/outdoor can as well. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased a long time ago!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has this pail at work in a warehouse kitchen where it gets lots of use. I'm sick of the little pails that force me to empty my kitchen garbage almost daily so I got this for my home kitchen. As I suspected it did not disappoint, love the size, taller but narrower than previous pails, love they grey color, lid keeps out stink and love being able to toss stuff in and lid just closes, no need for foot or unlock lid, or using hands to open lid
customer_reviews.author: MIKKI FLEX

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: our dog was constantly getting into our trash even when we had a lid on it. This is considered a commercial trash can but we use it in our home for the kitchen trash and it's perfect. It's very sturdy and durable and made out of great material. Our dog can no longer reach the top of it and can't knock the trash can over so it serves its purpose for us. We are very happy with it. And have told others about it and they have also purchased it. We will probably be buying another one for our bathroom. Thank you guys. PS. Our dog is a chihuahua so I'm sure you can relate.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Dill

customer_reviews.title: Great space- & time-saver for apartments! Unbelievable capacity.
customer_reviews.text: These take up comparatively little room, given how many gallons they can hold. So far, it seems any bag greater than or equal to 39 gallons is able to make contact with the bottom, but we're currently using the 42-gallon bags from the hardware store, & they just make things super easy. It's such a time- & space- saver, especially if you live in an apartment. It may be commercial-grade, but it works very well for residential. We bought two, one for trash & one for recycle. The lids also work great, and are very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scully

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a trash and recycling container, and could not really find an "all in one" solution that had enough space. I purchased two of these that I will put side by side/they have a small footprint and are heavy duty and sturdy although not difficult to lift. The gray color is pretty neutral. I have a stainless steel kitchen and did want matching cans, so my solution will be covering them with a contact paper that resembles stainless to give a more updated look. Even without that, these are a much better value than the flimsy lower priced stainless ones I've seen out there, or the overpriced simple human options.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 48443

customer_reviews.title: made to last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the kitchen because of the size and neutral color. I do like the weight and sturdiness of this item. This is not thin or flimsy plastic. The liner stay that keeps the trash bag from slipping down into the can is genius. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Powell

customer_reviews.title: The best Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: This is the best trash can I've ever had. The lid keeps odors down, its large sp I can empty less often and it has a convenient bag holder so the bag stays in place. I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Smith-Cockeran

customer_reviews.title: Great capacity but still a space saver
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh...i thought the price was high but this can is worth it ... Purchased for bottle recycling!! Not too obnoxious .but great capacity ..fits nicely due to its shape on my porch ..great quality . if you recycle your cans and bottles ..this is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds amazing amount of trash.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing trash can. I replaced a step on lid lift with this one. It holds a tremendous amount of trash in a smaller foot print. I have a small pantry and I am now able to have this along with its matching partner for recyclables in my pantry and not out in the kitchen. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: No lid no idea which one fits it no online support
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with a lid and it said it was an untouchable garbage can do I thought it would but now I am trying to find the correct swing lid to fit the garage can snd it should show it with the product even if there is an additional charge now I have no idea what to order and you can only call During the day Monday thru Friday. I work then.
customer_reviews.author: Beach

customer_reviews.title: Product is great but I measured slightly wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these trash cans or cans because I needed tall square ones to fit under the end of a counter next to the door. However I didnt hear the measurements correctly so only one can fits next to the door not under the counter curve section. I kept our old ugly shorter trash can but will figure out a use for the second black one. They are nice and tall but just barely an inch too tall for both to fit in the small section we have. :( I almost ordered lids but those would definately not fit. They were lower price once in my cart so I was pleased with that.
customer_reviews.author: MissV237

customer_reviews.title: Warning - This is only a trash can lid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and thought I was getting the trash can with the lid. It was only the lid, which is a strange size, so it wouldn't work with any cans I had. So, I had to order the matching can. That said, the lid it sturdy and a bit unique as far as trash can lids go. It works well for my purpose, overall I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth P

customer_reviews.title: Best trash can !
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through so much trash cans I lost count . Love this trash can. Its durable. Not too big not too small. 23 gallons for a 4 person family fills up in 3 days . I purchased two and one with the recycle cover as my town recycles. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Nazario

customer_reviews.title: Great lid option for your trash can
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement lid for my current trash can. This is a great option for any area that needs a closed lid but not the hassle of having to pick up the lid. The springs keep the lid closed and very easy to clean if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy trashcan
customer_reviews.text: This can is great. Super Sturdy and level. Only issue we have is the top gets dirty real quick. Not sure how to avoid it though. If they add a mechanism to open the top for you, we all know it will break in less than a year. 5 stars, highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jesusreport

customer_reviews.title: Find alternative.
customer_reviews.text: This would've been my third one, but the plastic/rubber is different than ones made in previous years. The material is much thinner than it has been in the past. The cover otoh is still the sturdy plastic that it's been in the past (now sold separately, when in the past it came with the can) . So why they changed the process of blow molding it and then making it much more expensive than past versions is beyond me.
customer_reviews.author: Tali18

customer_reviews.title: Good but long
customer_reviews.text: Good trash can. It is a little square and narrow so sometimes it can be hard to get the bag out. And most bags that are this capacity are shorter than the can. It could benefit from being about an inch shorter in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Perry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect garage trash can.
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can. It’s perfect for our garage and all of the summertime popsicle papers. The lid makes it easy for the kids to use and it keeps the flies away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a trashcan that was large, had a lid and was easy to dispose of trash. This was the one. I loved how sturdy, clean and easy it was to use that I bought another one to recycle.
customer_reviews.author: MSE

customer_reviews.title: Came with trash and chewed gum inside...
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable. The trash can is as described in terms of the size. What they do leave out is that mine came with a piece of trash inside and chewed gum stuck to the bottom of the can. Clearly not a new item. Disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Morton

customer_reviews.title: Very well-made
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made, it fits perfectly on the Rubbermaid Commercial FG356988BEIG Rectangular 23-Gallon Untouchable Trash Can. Yes, it can be considered "Untouchable" when you drop trash into the receptacle with this lid, but, only if the item has some weight to it. If it's paper you're disposing of, for instance, you'll still need to push it through the slot.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gee

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Very pricy , but worth it. Big enough to hold boxes. Everything comes in a box now days . Does not take up to much room on your kitchen floor. It even takes a pizza box without having to fold it.the thing that holds the trash bag in place is just genius . No more bag slippage . Does require at least a 39 gallon bag , but you can buy them here on Amazon at a good price at a high count too. Less trips to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D Head

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice go our large family. I took flaps off and we now have room without removing bag before time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for the trash can we purchased at a ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for the trash can we purchased at a local box store a few years ago. The old lid lost one of the counter weights (one side wouldn't close anymore) and the local box store didn't sell the lid only. This works as well as the original, so was happy to not have to buy a whole new can.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Is it possible to live a garbage can?
customer_reviews.text: Bought the trash can and lid for home use. Perfect solution, looks sharp, taller than your normal home use garbage can, love the drop in and it returned itself to a closed lud feature, sturdy, solved the problem of having hadfuls if stuff and needing to juggle or set things down while trying to dispose of trash, wide opening, so far dog proof.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just got them and haven't really tried them but love the bigger size. I got the light gray and they are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: GrannyB

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Size and Durability
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase. It works in my small closet - it’s the perfect square size. Nice and tall so I don’t have to empty recycling nearly as often.
customer_reviews.author: Deb G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces and doesnt look like a monstrosity
customer_reviews.text: For being a garbage can, its not ugly so it can be out in the open, bags never get stuck in this design, im buying more for my recycling
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Leach

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size!! No more messy trash bins. Perfect size for a family of 7.
customer_reviews.author: Ajoslin

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids to know which is recycling
customer_reviews.text: Great to help the family distinguish from the garbage can! Was dreading having to spend money on an entire blue can
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Meets the needs of the one!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cover for an electrical post in my backyard. My electrician suggested a fake rock or a good quality rubber trash can. I opted for a great quality rubber trash can. This is large enough for the air circulation and heavy enough that it stays "put" even when the winds kick up. Also, it just "disappears" amid the plants and pottery!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Survives heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my preschool classroom. We have two and they have both held up super great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie G

customer_reviews.title: Contain your Trash
customer_reviews.text: My home generates a lot of kitchen trash. This is the second 23 gallon large bin a bought. I love it. The split top keeps the trash and odors inside. I only wish more places sold liners for that size bin. I have to order in bulk from a business wholesaler.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This is about the best heavy duty commercial trash can for residential use that I could find. It's small enough to fit into the space I have in my kitchen and small enough to fit the 33-gallon sized trash bags. The trash cans that I was able to find in the stores were not large enough for me and made of flimsy plastic so this one works great. When I purchased my trash can, I was able to get free shipping so that was a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carjam1206

customer_reviews.title: That it is exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted!!! Always a bit hesitant to buy without seeing it in person but it is perfect . I am using it as a recycle can in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Thank You!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was going to have to throw out the best trash can ever when the lid broke after a couple years... so glad you had it!! Plan to buy another one for a back up soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I live in small apartment with limited space. Compact yet holds as much trash as a my previous drum trash can. Easily fits multiple bag sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy C.

customer_reviews.title: Big strong trash can if you don't want to take the trash out every 1-2 days
customer_reviews.text: I got this one to my kitchen as the small once get full really quick ! it is really nice and looks like it will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Large and very functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can, it's large and sturdy. The lid is amazing and easy to clean. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cecter

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with the recycling decal on the lid
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 of these lids and the picture shows a mixed recycling decal on the lid and they did not come with the decal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Maloy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Garbage Can
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for the money. I love the big size.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: Provide spare as cover which breaks.
customer_reviews.text: I would request to provide the cover of this item as spare on demand. I have one container where the cover broke and it is useless without the cover. Let us not waste energy and create more pollution when just an cover can help and I had to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used at our cafe to cover the dirty towel bin
customer_reviews.text: Used at our cafe to cover the dirty towel bin, works good to keep smells down and not have to worry about tying the bag off every night.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Does FIT
customer_reviews.text: love it, fits perfectly. Our original lid cracked after 5+ years and the can/lid is so perfect we were very happy to find this replacement lid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Well I was thinking of how to explain a trash can. A well built perfect fitting trash can. We use these as a liner inside of a thank you trash can. No complaints at all. This was the only can I could find with the proper dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tholen

customer_reviews.title: Takes up less floor space.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, taller than my previous kitchen trash receptacle so it takes up less floor space. Very satisfied, although pretty costly considering it's just a simple, just taller, design.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gee

customer_reviews.title: Best Trashcan Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best trashcan ever. We have a large extended family and live on a farm. This has helped tremendously with the fly population as well as keeping the trash area nice and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sessions

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. I could not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: We are using this in a home, not a commercial setting. I purchased the original can with lid 8/18/14. The lid cracked and eventually broke. I replaced the lid 7/2/15 and it now needs replaced again. Bad quality. I could not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic well made and sturdy. Holds a tons of garbage and takes up 1/3 the space of traditional designs. Rubbermaid has done it again!
customer_reviews.author: clara1

customer_reviews.title: REPLACEMENT FOR LID THAT I CRACKED DUE TO DROPPING.
customer_reviews.text: A REPLACEMENT FOR A LID THAT HAD BEEN DROPPED AND CRACKED. GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cans!
customer_reviews.text: Great recycling container, doesn't take up a lot of space. I purchased the lid with this, and couldn't be happier with it. Love the little lip that holds the garbage bag in place. Holds quite a few cans. Was difficult to find one of these that didn't cost a fortune that went with the can/bottle lid...
customer_reviews.author: aprilwine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Rubbermaid Commercial trash cans. I use them commercially at a sports complex and they are very durable and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Durable.
customer_reviews.text: We use these in my medical practice and they work perfectly. Very sturdy, durable and long lasting. They hold a lot! We have used them for 3 years and they show no wear. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: Great height, I bought this can due to my pit mix thinking he should grab items out of the trash.This can has a flip down lid and its the perfect height to keep his head out of the can
customer_reviews.author: robin howard

customer_reviews.title: This is slim and easy to tuck partially under our bar
customer_reviews.text: Bought with commercial untouchable lid. Pricey, but worth it. Step cans took up more space because we had to move them away from the walls to avoid stains and damage to the paint. This is slim and easy to tuck partially under our bar. Tall so it uses more of the trash bag with less waste. Would buy another
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Solid thick plastic cover with large metal hinges. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tali18

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Had for many years. Nice that I can just replace the top and don’t have to replace the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Holds more garbage and keeps my dog out of it.
customer_reviews.author: niki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized can for the space. Lid flaps are sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized can for the space. Lid flaps are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Warren

customer_reviews.title: Works good - we use it to cover our dirty towels ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good - we use it to cover our dirty towels at Starbucks, it fits perfectly on the standard Rubbermaid square cans. No more nasty milk towel smell!
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Dog proof, stylish and large! Perfect and just what we needed. it works well for my large family and is priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Use as replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a cracked old square swing top. This has a lower profile so the trash jams the cover swings when near full. This one looks rounded but it does fit the old squaretop. Seems like the bin is better made than the top but this will do till the bin needs replaceing
customer_reviews.author: amzn buyer

customer_reviews.title: ... cans for our kitchen at work and these work perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased new trash cans for our kitchen at work and these work perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The dents from shipping a large plastic can came out and it was not flimsy to carry.

customer_reviews.title: It's Rubbermaid... Nuff Said
customer_reviews.text: Great space saving design for a recycle bin. I saw one in a local business, so I went out to search for it on the web and found right here on Amazon w/ free shipping! (and no sales tax, for now anyway)

customer_reviews.title: solid constructed nicely. happy
customer_reviews.text: i was worried about the lid. if it would break . solid constructed nicely. happy.

customer_reviews.title: Good for recycle bins
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a recycle bin for tin cans. It doesn't take up much room and a large trash bag just fits in the container.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: this lid fits perfectly on the 23-gallon untouchable trash can and the swing top keeps garbage or anything else out of sight. We use it to collect dirty scrubs in our surgery center.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace to old one, glad we found this. Perfect fit

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The square 16" swing top lid keeps garbage or anything else out of sight. We use it to collect dirty scrubs in our surgery center. This is very roomy and has a small footprint.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: needed this for a customer and these are the perfect size. had to order the top from somewhere else, but these are quality plastic and construction

customer_reviews.title: Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the replacement (which I believe are made better than the flawed (by design?) original cover.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the breakroom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my breakroom at work, it's the perfect size, and it has really encouraged everyone to be better at recycling!
customer_reviews.author: Kandie Kunz

customer_reviews.title: It's Rubbermaid What more do you need to know?
customer_reviews.text: It's Rubbermaid What more do you need to know? It's the perfect size to fit where other recycling bins are too big. It was perfect for our business!
customer_reviews.author: Guy in SC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best trash can I ever had- after I weighted the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L Luby

customer_reviews.title: Minimalism at home
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this bin to help conquer the "recycling pile" that was accumulating in my kitchen (they only collect every other week). And this is no ordinary pile. Imagine Gatorade and bottles, broken-down cardboard boxes, and assorted soup cans piled halfway to the ceiling. I was beginning to fear that the pile would, at some point, become sentient and form a giant Voltron-like being, chasing us and my cats around the house until eventually devouring everyone whole. This bin embodies a recyclable-containment field that prevents that from happening, and we're grateful for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ferris Gibran

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: We use these at my work place and needed replacement lids. They last a long time and are durable! Have ordered before, great price on amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size and the fact that I don't have to open lid to toss garbage.

customer_reviews.title: Best trash can ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best trash can ever. Wish they bags I purchased would fit the inside but they come up short

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: Best garbage can ever! Needed something tough for kids and dogs. This did the job!

customer_reviews.title: There is only one handle. If I had known ...
customer_reviews.text: There is only one handle. If I had known this, I may not have purchased three of them to use as recycling containers. I need two handles for lifting.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful heavyweight Recycling bin
customer_reviews.text: Its very durble and has a nice wedge to tighten you garbage bag and fasten into the tub. Very spacious and guest are never confused where to put recyclable waste.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our space
customer_reviews.text: this trash can is exactly what we needed for a small diameter space with a large capacity need. I also ordered the top. It fits the space in our utility room perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Keeps things neat in the office
customer_reviews.text: Using with the Rubbermaid Commercial 23-Gallon Untouchable Recycling Container, Rectangular, 15.5" Width x 16.5" Depth x 30.9" Height, Blue. Keeps the office more tidy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the added hook to keep the trash bag from falling in.

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Keeps things neat in the office
customer_reviews.text: Using with the Rubbermaid Commercial Untouchable Lid for Recycling Container, Square, 16" Width x 16" Length x 3.25" Height, Blue. Keeps the office tidy.

customer_reviews.title: Quality garbage can
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy can and has a built in cinch. It was exactly what we needed for our child centered business.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for a trash can that was tall enough to keep my 1 year old from getting in to it yet not easily tipped over. The little feature that keeps the bag from falling in works great too. It is a bit pricey but works well for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Forsaken Soul

customer_reviews.title: Best garbage can around.
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can is excellent, I wanted something in my kitchen that had a lid, easy to get bags out when full and held more than 13 gallons. The can has a bag holder on side to keep garbage bag secure and lid is nice and self closes. Bags come out really easy when full and don't get stuck with that suction you get in most garbage cans. Should last me forever, lids alone sell for over $25 and this comes we with self closing lid, so is great deal.
customer_reviews.author: rotwiler

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect! Well pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Fits right up to my counter. Also works with 30gallon trash bags! just get trash can bag clips the ones for 30 gallon trash cans. Well pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice, needed to replace the top to my can after having it for 10 years. Even though I felt it was expensive just for the top. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: LynneD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trash can
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, although the material used is a little thinner than it was years ago.
customer_reviews.author: mark feiner

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor trashcan
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice and sturdy so far I leave it under a tree on patio so soon won't kill it. It's unobtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Vera city

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Commercial Products Untouchable Square Trash/Garbage Container with Lid, Gray (2001584)
product_meta.description: Color:Gray| Style:Container with LidThe Rubbermaid Commercial Untouchable Trash Can features a sleek square design for a professional image. The garbage can is durable and crack-resistant, even under tough indoor/outdoor conditions. This trash can is perfect for hotel lobbies, offices, restrooms, shopping malls, restaurants, and other public locations.
feature_bullets: Venting Channels: Air Current Channels at the Bottom of the Container Allow for Trash Bags to Be Removed Easier
Built in Bag Cinches: Liner Cinches Built Into the Rim of the Basket Allow for Knot Free Trash Bag Retention
High Capacity Shape: Square Container Shape Holds 25 Percent More Than Circular Receptacle
LESS TRIPS TO EMPTY: Large 23 Gallon capacity allows for longer time between emptying trips
COMMERCIAL GRADE STRENGTH: Resin material is durable and crack resistant, even under tough indoor/outdoor conditions
EASY TO CLEAN: Seamless plastic construction makes for no leaks and an easy to clean surface
ACCESSORIES AVAILABLE: Perfect to sit in the open, paired with a swing or recycling lid; or hide the container under a fixture or counter
ADVANCED PLASTIC MATERIAL: Made from high density polyethylene, which resists moisture and chemicals
MADE IN THE USA: Recognized as a “Brand of the Century”, Rubbermaid is 1 of only 100 companies named as having an impact on the American way of life; RCP products are made in Winchester, Virginia
